channel.title: Dedicating a Server?
channel.description:
Ok i got my server up, everything working, people are happy and now i wanna dedicate it.
Ok i know its a little costly but i understand. Could someone show me how or if someone could link me to a tutorial that would be great and i know this is a question probably not asked often. Any type of help would be great! thanks

item.title: Dedicating a Server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Dedicated hosting service

A dedicated hosting service, dedicated server, or managed hosting service is a type of Internet hosting in which the client leases an entire server not shared with anyone else. This is more flexible than shared hosting, as organizations have full control over the server(s), including choice of operating system, hardware, etc. There is also another level of dedicated or managed hosting commonly referred to as complex managed hosting. Complex Managed Hosting applies to both physical dedicated serv...

Read full topic
